channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: Top Places to Eat in Brooklyn, Manhattan, and Queens. https://t.co/jZhx3t5xOd
item.source:markdown: Top Places to Eat in Brooklyn, Manhattan, and Queens. https://t.co/jZhx3t5xOd

item.description:
I listened to Keith Olbermann's podcast today.

Wow. It's a reboot of his old MSNBC show. I missed this so much.

MSNBC is so much lamer without him.

I rate it must-listen.

https://t.co/u4HgE1zRZe
item.source:markdown:
I listened to Keith Olbermann's podcast today.
Wow. It's a reboot of his old MSNBC show. I missed this so much.
MSNBC is so much lamer without him.
I rate it must-listen.
https://t.co/u4HgE1zRZe

item.description:
Feature request for @amazonmusic.

I live in an area with no cell service.

It takes about ten minutes to drive to where there is service.

I'd like to have my queue not run out for ten minutes.

Could it learn?

PS: My phone has lots of memory.
item.source:markdown:
Feature request for @amazonmusic.
I live in an area with no cell service.
It takes about ten minutes to drive to where there is service.
I'd like to have my queue not run out for ten minutes.
Could it learn?
PS: My phone has lots of memory.

item.description:
@gwthompson @KeithOlbermann Have you tried pasting that URL into your RSS reader app? I have -- it can't find it. Look at the URL -- it's a monstrosity.

https://t.co/WFDdB1Wi2n

It doesn't look like that's meant to last.

@gwthompson @KeithOlbermann On the other hand -- it does seem to work! Oy. I could've sworn I tried that.

I can't find the RSS feed for Countdown with @KeithOlbermann. All the usual methods of finding it aren't working. I want to use my own podcatcher.

https://t.co/YZ6rCkRn8t

Any help much appreciated.
item.source:markdown:
I can't find the RSS feed for Countdown with @KeithOlbermann. All the usual methods of finding it aren't working. I want to use my own podcatcher.
https://t.co/YZ6rCkRn8t
Any help much appreciated.

item.description:
1/2 I've been working outside an office for over 30 years, except for a brief period when i had an office at berkman. because i had the office, i was able to get an experienced radio team (lydon and mcgrath) to work with me on this idea i had for audio blogging (which became

2/2 podcasting) and one of my colleagues suggested that blogging would work well with politics, which got the bootstrap of political blogging going. so -- having an office and using it is good. things get created that way that otherwise wouldn't.
item.source:markdown:
1/2 I've been working outside an office for over 30 years, except for a brief period when i had an office at berkman. because i had the office, i was able to get an experienced radio team (lydon and mcgrath) to work with me on this idea i had for audio blogging (which became
2/2 podcasting) and one of my colleagues suggested that blogging would work well with politics, which got the bootstrap of political blogging going. so -- having an office and using it is good. things get created that way that otherwise wouldn't.

item.description:
@Borthwick @rozzie @mkapor JB I agree -- the conference looks very worthwhile. I have to say maybe -- I haven't been to a conf since 2019. Haven't been to NYC.. But I'm going down for a Mets game later this week and staying overnight. I'll have a better idea if I'm up for another trip after.

@Borthwick @rozzie @mkapor Regardless what you're doing is important. I'd like to stay in the loop.
item.source:markdown:
@Borthwick @rozzie @mkapor JB I agree -- the conference looks very worthwhile. I have to say maybe -- I haven't been to a conf since 2019. Haven't been to NYC.. But I'm going down for a Mets game later this week and staying overnight. I'll have a better idea if I'm up for another trip after.
@Borthwick @rozzie @mkapor Regardless what you're doing is important. I'd like to stay in the loop.

item.description:
@jerrymichalski i don't know what 'ends in a hang' means. what's on the screen? maybe you have some security software that's preventing the login? can you try on another computer?

@jerrymichalski Jerry -- let me know if you want to keep trying.

I won't be back at my desk until tomorrow afternoon, but I will help, and we can get you signed on, I'm sure of it.

Keep on truckin. ;-)
@jerrymichalski If you look at the top right of the screen in drummer, there's a place where it says Log in here, click, choose the last menu item. Hopefully that will get you connected.
item.source:markdown: @jerrymichalski If you look at the top right of the screen in drummer, there's a place where it says Log in here, click, choose the last menu item. Hopefully that will get you connected.
